title: Lenovo VIBE K5 Plus Quick Review
description: Ingat GADGET, ingat DROIDLIME...!Spesifikasi Lenovo VIBE K5 Plus:Harga: Rp2.249.000 CPU:  8-core Snapdragon 616 1,5 GHzGPU: Adreno 405RAM: 2 GBStorage: 16 GBOS: Android 5.1Kamera: 13 MP & 5 MPLayar: IPS 5 inci (1.920 x 1.080 piksel)Baterai: 2.750 mAhSensor: Accelerometer, proximity, gyroscopeUSB OTG: YaScreen-on-time: 3-4 jamAnTuTu Benchmark: 31 ribu poinGame di video ini:Sky Force Reloaded https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pl.idreams.SkyForceReloaded2016Talent: Puty Sjahrul MunirDevice tested by: DroidLime (Romi Hidayat)Lokasi: Tantular Cafe - Kedoya(https://www.instagram.com/tantularcafe/)FB: DroidLime https://www.facebook.com/droidlimeTwitter: @droidlime https://twitter.com/droidlimeGPlus: DroidLime https://plus.google.com/+DroidlimeInstagram: https://instagram.com/droidlime/LINE@: @droidlime
tags: review lenovo vibe k5 plus indonesia
